scripts.deploy-remote: yarn run codegen && yarn run build && graph deploy --studio ${NAME:-null}
scripts.deploy:mainnet: SUBGRAPH_TEMPLATE=subgraph-full NETWORK=mainnet NAME=ren yarn run deploy-remote
scripts.deploy:testnet: SUBGRAPH_TEMPLATE=subgraph-full NETWORK=testnet NAME=ren-testnet yarn run deploy-remote
scripts.deploy:local: yarn run codegen && graph deploy --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://localhost:8020/ ${NAME:-renproject/renvm}
